def has_dirty_sink():
    # Function to check if there is a dirty bathroom sink
    symbol dirty_sink=exists s: item : is_sink(s) and dirty(s) and is_bathroom(s)
    return dirty_sink

behavior __goal__():
    body:
        if exists sink: item : is_sink(sink) and dirty(sink) and is_bathroom(sink):
            # Check if there is a dirty sink in the bathroom based on the available information
            bind sink: item where:
                is_sink(sink) and dirty(sink) and is_bathroom(sink)
            # Select the dirty bathroom sink
            achieve close_char(char, sink)
            # Move the character closer to the sink

        else:
            # If no dirty bathroom sink is found, initiate exploration to locate one
            foreach sink: item:
                if is_sink(sink) and not visited(sink) and is_bathroom(sink):
                    observe(sink, "Check if the sink is dirty")
